items.name: Ischoolconnect
items.text: Saundnya was a valuable member of the marketing team at iSchoolConnect, bringing creativity, reliability, and a strong understanding of digital storytelling to her role. She consistently approached her work with enthusiasm and ownership, contributing thoughtfully to social media strategy, content creation, and campaign execution. Saundnya has a sharp eye for brand voice, a strong work ethic, and the ability to translate insights into engaging content. She is proactive, collaborative, and a pleasure to work with, and I have no doubt she will be an asset to any team she joins.

items.name: Rockage Entertainment
items.text: At Rockage Entertainment, Saundnya consistently demonstrated exceptional public relations instincts by executing high-impact campaigns, building strong influencer relationships, and elevating the brand’s public image through strategic storytelling and flawless event promotion. Her ability to blend creativity with strategy helped Rockage Entertainment and Mitron franchise expand its visibility while maintaining a strong and authentic brand voice.

items.name: Nevada Conservatory Theatre
items.text: At Nevada Conservatory Theatre, Saundnya played a vital role in shaping the company’s public-facing image through innovative marketing campaigns, compelling copy, and strategic audience engagement across digital platforms. Her work significantly strengthened community outreach and ticket awareness by transforming productions into powerful, story-driven promotional narratives.
